resources.string: No plants found.\nAdd a plant using\nthe button below.
This screen shows the plant most in need of watering.
This screen shows every plant currently being tracked by the app.
The plant ID is the ID of the sensor monitoring the plant. Enter the ID found on the sensor\'s box to get the humidity levels for your plant.
You can name your plants anything you want! Name it after the sensor, the plant species, or give it a unique name of its own. It\'s up to you.
The minimum humidity is the humidity level at which you want the app to notify you that it\'s time to water your plant. This value must be between 0 and 100, and cannot contain decimals.
